name: Account

preflow.name: Preflows

ringback.description: The module name exposing get_ringback(whapps_call:call()) -> {ne_binary(),ne_binary()}. Will be called to get {custom ringback media,opaque binary}. Opaque will be added to the preflow.always callflow arguments as opaque property

always.name: Callflow ID
